website_summaries.verdict: This affordable spray-on bug repellent is effortlessly applied, and once it’s on your pet, it does double duty by killing off itchy clingers like fleas, while repelling any nearby flying bloodsuckers.
pros: Kills fleas, ticks, and lice on contact
Repels biting gnats, mosquitoes, and flies
Convenient spray bottle covers pets with a few spritzes
For use on cats and dogs
cons: It would be nice if Flys-Off was available in an even larger bottle size

customer_reviews.title: Works great but small bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my outside dog. I have an old pit bull who just this year started having really bad issues with flies. Flies constantly around her and causing bleeding on her ears, knees, and back. Even asked the vet for a medication to use but was told they didn't know of anything. Found Flys Off, Great! Last days on her and doesn't smell bad. Only reason it was given 4 stars is that the bottle is very small and a bit pricy for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. We use it at the kennels and I sprayed around garbage cans and kennels during hot days. Flies do not like this stuff. Love that it is safe for the animals as well. Small bottle but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: TsunamiMommyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love itnd my Dogs love it too
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! My poor dogs had dogs on them all the time. We would bath them and clean our deck regularly but still these darn files just persist. I read the reviews on this product and took a chance and it works Flies do not get near my Dogs any more. Thank you for making this product. I spray a bit on my dogs coat and with my hands a I spread it all over it works amazingly well. I have 3 dogs and it work s on all 3. Also, their coat feels great. I would give it more stars.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Works Almost Immediately!
customer_reviews.text: This year was particularly bad for flies and other insects. I had used the Flys Off ointment in the past with good results but this year it just wasn’t working. My poor dog was plagued by flies whenever he stepped outside. I decided to try the Flys Off spray and it worked great. I sprayed my dog and the results were almost immediate. I also sprayed around the entrance to his doghouse. I had to respray in about a week but it gave my dog relief. The bottle is tiny and I had to reorder a couple of times. It’s a little pricey, but worth it fir the comfort of your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Artie224

customer_reviews.title: Helped our poor cat from being attacked by mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves to go outside but, since he’s a tuxedo cat, the mosquitoes and horse flies are drawn to him...they tear his poor ears up in the summer. I needed something to put on him to repel those nasty pests from messing our buddy’s ears up and this stuff has done the trick! He HATES having it put on him but I’d rather him be upset with me for a minute than be miserable with sores on his ears.
customer_reviews.author: Jfp757

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my cats.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my cats. They do not like it but it really does work for them. I sprayed some on my arm and legs and it worked well on me. I use Repel regularly as it is the only brand that actually works for me and I've tried about every brand on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Flys-Off insect repellent for dogs and cats WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This year, my outdoor pets have been plagued by big black flies! I was hesitant to use this spray as the directions said to work into the pets coat (avoiding eyes) and I was afraid it might sting or make my pet uncomfortable. I started slowly and found there was no problem at all AND one treatment lasts 8 days it says! I am on day 3 and flies no longer bother my pets! I also sprayed their beds and eating area (without food present) and flies are gone! I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: This actually works! I tried so many things on my femal German shepherd & nothing was working. I bought this on a limb & it actually worked! I'm so happy because my dog was starting to look sad & sick. This product is amazing it keeps the flies away for sure. At first you will see the flies trying to land & will land but for a short second & will eventually fly away & leave your dog alone. I spray this generously around her ears, top of head, & all over body including tail.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: We live on a lake that has many horseflies, regular flies and mosquitoes in the summer. I ordered this product for my dogs and LOVE it!! It works fabulously, smells good and a great value. I've recommended this to all of our neighbors and will definitely purchase this again when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: ozhappy

customer_reviews.title: Container size, (deceptively ?) small.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works but be aware of its size.. whatever happened to including something of known size in the picture, like a scale, so anyone can immediately judge the size of the container.
customer_reviews.author: GlevumGuy.

customer_reviews.title: Strong stuff - really works
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely worked to keep deer flies, black flies, and mosquitoes from biting our dog during a summer trip to the Adirondacks. He came away without any bites at all, which is a first. Flies swarmed around him, but did not bite. The product is actually a pyrethrin insecticide, not only a repellent, and you should be aware that it has a pretty strong chemical smell. But it works! A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: EntomoGeek

customer_reviews.title: Fly-off Spray
customer_reviews.text: This is one product I recommend. I have two large dogs and I have searched for a product for so long to help my dogs from biting flies, tried so many other products that don't work just a waste of money till I came across this spray. I just spray it on their backs, legs and ears and it works the flies don't get near them! the scent is very pleasant! the only thing is that it comes in a 6oz size no larger and its pricy, but in the long run its worth it. Just so that those pesky flies don't bother my babies.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Efficient against ticks
customer_reviews.text: My cat is an indoor/outdoor cat and he was infested by ticks and brought back home up to 7 at a time despite the use of Frontline. After trying some natural solutions unsuccessfully, I tried that and it is working perfectly. No more ticks since I am using it. Applying on my cat is not the easiest thing as he is trying to dodge it but once done, he is fine with it. The smell of the spray is a little bit strong but it smells very nice after it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Nella

customer_reviews.title: BOTTLE CAME EMPTY
customer_reviews.text: Its EMPTY!! There's absolutely nothing in the bottle!! As you can see the bottle top wasn't even screwed on properly! You would think they would of noticed when packaging or delivering it. It all most of spilled out because the cap isn't screwed on. I was going to return or replace it but it said this product isn't eligible for it. I really want my money back or for amazon to send me a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Julia🐾

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I breed Cane Corso's and when they are outside flies just attack them. I read the reviews on this and decided to give it a try. It works, it really does. Glad to have it for my dogs who are relieved to have this sprayed on them. Now I have 4 Cane Corso's and the bottle isn't that big however, for my babies its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen White

customer_reviews.title: Rip off!
customer_reviews.text: My bottle was completely empty. Either leaked or evaporated but my box has zero evidence of getting wet. Whoever packed my box should have known it was an empty bottle. Worse yet, unable to return due to contents were a safety hazard. Total waste of money. Stay away, save your money & DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottles
customer_reviews.text: This product works but your bottles are broken. EVERY SINGLE bottle leaks before arriving. Your bottle sizes are already annoying. Fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex  Review Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: It works.  It might leak on the way to you.
customer_reviews.text: Our clients at the vet clinic where I work report that this product works well. I do the ordering for the clinic, and decided to try purchasing this product from amazon this time, and usually I'm happy with how my amazon purchases arrive. However, this time all the bottles were just dumped into a box with a very minimal bit of padding, and one opened up and the whole thing leaked out soaking the box and contents. It smelled quite strong to say the least. So, better wrapping and padding, please!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this product for my dog since flies are coming back this summer. They tend to bite his ears. I have used the pomade of the same brand "fly off" and it is way better at keeping flies off. I bought this spray because I thought I could just spray without getting g too much product on me. It has a cologne type smell which is off-putting for me. But once the scent fades away the flies start coming back. Dont recommend if you will be out on a long hike or outdoors for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This product does exactly what it is supposed to do ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it is supposed to do. I have five boxers who live outdoors, this product is a real ear-saver, because the flies will eat their ears to pieces if I don't apply this a couple times a week.
customer_reviews.author: D. Boswell

customer_reviews.title: It works, small quantity received
customer_reviews.text: Like that it works but for the price it's expensive...to me. The bottle size is less than average woman palm size. So just be aware of amount. Previous fly off products have worked well so I can update if product is less effective.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Works well for keeping horseflies and black flies off my dog when walking in the woods. We used it pretty sparingly as the fragrance makes my dog sneeze initially but even just a small amount works and I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: REH

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my two dogs
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for my dogs at all. The flies continued to chew their ears after spraying this stuff on. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Bottle way too small
customer_reviews.text: It works, which is the main thing I guess. Only problem is that I have 2 Labs and was only able to use this twice on each with a little left over before the bottle ran out. No value for the money at all. It's also overly scented.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Winter

customer_reviews.title: It lives up to its name!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got a boxer and a pit bull and the flies absolutely attack them during the summer. I’ve been aware of the ointment, it’s an old faithful product that we’ve used a long time in our family. When I saw the repellent I was ecstatic. We’re very well pleased and the reputation didn’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: P.K.

customer_reviews.title: Works....
customer_reviews.text: Kept the biting flies away from the dog. The dog didn't like the smell of it, but tolerated it. No more of those nasty black fly bites in the groin area to deal with. The dog can go outside without fear. True, this is only a problem from April through early July in New England where we live, but still... good to have a bottle on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Saves your dog from black flies
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty dang good at protecting my pups from those dang black flies! I have two pitties and the black flies tear them up pretty bad camping. This spray with the rub works great they only get a few bites.
customer_reviews.author: Lorne

customer_reviews.title: Works great light scent
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in our family is scent sensitive. This has a very light scent. Although we use flea and tick protection my pup always has issues with gnats and less often mosquitos. This works awesome. I’ve been using Flys Off for years and it’s never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline C

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great fly repellent for dogs. Within seconds the flying went away. Spray bottle is very small so I would recommend getting two or buying a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Texas heat
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It keeps mesquites and flies away. We like to sit outside but our medium size dog is always getting bitten as we live in hot Texas. Since getting this our dog is able to enjoy outside.
customer_reviews.author: Mungia

customer_reviews.title: Fly Repellant
customer_reviews.text: It has worked in the past but my store only sell a larger bottle
customer_reviews.author: Rita P.

customer_reviews.title: Keep those flys off
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. Now if only the bottle would be bigger and stay at the price it is now. It's expensive for the amount. This 6oz bottle only last 2 wks. I use it on my dog every other day. I can't stand flys so I buy and you should too if you want to keep those nasty flys of your pet.
customer_reviews.author: rubi

customer_reviews.title: smells great and works
customer_reviews.text: This product is working better than others I have tried in the past. I would purchase it again because my dogs get flies easily even after constant baths. I like that it also smells good.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Need a working solution
customer_reviews.text: There were still flies all around our pets. We keep the area clean where they live, but when summer comes around, there’s no stopping the flies! This definitely didn’t help keep them off
customer_reviews.author: _katie_a

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great my dog absolutely hates it though but if I can get her to hold still long enough for it to dry the flys totally stay off of her. The bottle is super small though and I feel like it came half full but maybe that's just how it comes. The smell is a little strong but nothing crazy. My boyfriend says it smells like Old Spice. Not sure..
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Not working as the cream
customer_reviews.text: My husky Star is suffering a lot from the flies. His ear is like covered by flies every time I saw him outside. I bought this spay and another cream together. But this spray is not working. The cream helps avoid the flies standing on his ears, but this spray did nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Lilizzzz

customer_reviews.title: this is fantastic stuff. I've searched high and low for it
customer_reviews.text: this is fantastic stuff. I've searched high and low for it, I've used it for around 20 years. My boxers have always fought flies. The product is great, the bottle, not so much. On my second bottle, and both bottles have leaked out product. My first bottle came half full. ***Note to seller-how about a little strapping tape placed over the nozzle to prevent leakage?**** Problem solved, cheaply. Boom!
customer_reviews.author: FrischInKs

customer_reviews.title: Tighten top before shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but I ordered two and one of the bottles was completely empty. It had leaked out as top was loose. I just recommend that seller makes sure top is tight before packing and shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca P.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not impressed. It's a tiny bottle and not worth the price. Ended up going to local store and finding a big bottle for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Kept biting flies and mosquitoes off our dogs while we camped in a heavy insect area! We reapplied daily because they had a penchant for swimming but it worked so well!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.S124

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a rag doll that loves going outside on my back porch. We live in FL and FL summers come with extra mosquitoes. I simply spray a few pumps on his fur and rub him down and no more mosquitoes. Now he can enjoy being outside without being attacked by mosquitoes. I absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.author: chrissy brogan

customer_reviews.title: Had to keep re-applying
customer_reviews.text: Trying to keep the flies off my poor dog and if we didn't keep re-applying the flies would come back on him. We went through this small bottle pretty quick. Will not be getting again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn R

customer_reviews.title: Ear savers
customer_reviews.text: Every summer the flies feast on my bull mastiffs ears, leaving it bloody. Though my dog does not to sprayed it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Cam's Cupcakes

customer_reviews.title: More like Flys ON
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this on my babies hoping this would work better than the ointment and no such luck. It seemed to attract more flies.
customer_reviews.author: IRENE F.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This spray helped repel flies, but it really didn't do much for the gnats. The smell isn't horrible to me, but my dogs weren't a fan. I bought this spray to help give my dogs some relief from the gnats, so since it didn't really do much I probably wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: ast219Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: tiny tiny
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to be a regular size bottle not a travel size, should have looked at amount of bottle lol
customer_reviews.author: Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Our poor mastiff was being eaten alive by biting flies in ...
customer_reviews.text: This works to keep the flys off and is HALF the price than our local Petco. It smells decent also. Our poor mastiff was being eaten alive by biting flies in her kennel. We also hung fly traps. Just wish it came in a larger bottle with a price break but at least it was a LOT cheaper on Amazon than at Petco.
customer_reviews.author: C.K.-14

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Either I'm going to have to use the entire bottle on my pitts or reapply everyday. It worked one night and the next morning they were covered in gnats and flies.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great Fly Away Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of flyaway and it works great. Keeps the flies off the dogs ears and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Propes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years, works very well. Current use for dogs being plagued by biting gnats.
customer_reviews.author: J. Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Flies Go Away Now!
customer_reviews.text: I hate flies on the patio and near my dogs! They will go away instantly! This spray works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kurnosoff

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Showed up in box with cap off and box reeking of chemicals. No returns, no refunds. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: The smell is not very good but it does work well. My dog couldn't go outside without being bit now she hardly gets bit at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Works really great on my dogs and near their feeding areas! Keeps the flies away 💯! Buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Monica S.

customer_reviews.title: IDK
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells pretty potent and I don’t think it works that well. My dogs didn’t seem to like it at all
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY

customer_reviews.title: This really works
customer_reviews.text: We camp with our dogs frequently. Respray them every few hours, keeps knats, flies , fleas, mosquitos and ticks away. I’ll admit I’ve used it on myself also. It works.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t appear to work at all
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through two bottles of this spray and it seems to have zero effect on the flys.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use this in Australia and it works great for keeping the flies off the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: fly spray helped a little
customer_reviews.text: Bought this spray for my two dogs. With the monsoon weather in AZ plus my next door neighbor's horses my dogs were covered in fly's. I applied the amount the bottle said to and it helped a little, but did not repel the fly's completely. I also purchased fly traps which I believe made the biggest difference. I am currently using the very small fly's off spray bottles to reconstitute an equine fly spray that is working the best for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I simply didn't do anything. The flies kept landing right where I sprayed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My package showed up with the contents of the bottle completely empty. The kid wasn't even screwed on and fell off when I reached in the box. There was no sign of moisture damage to the box so I am confused when I might have happened. I am disappointed because i really wants to try to help get relief for my dog this summer. I'll be asking for a refund most definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Grana

customer_reviews.title: Shame
customer_reviews.text: The product it's self is good it does what it says for sure, but the bottles are always leaking or have busted and failed entirely. It's a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Ru G.

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: this smells so amazing my dogs smell great and it kept flies out of their face
customer_reviews.author: sara macias

customer_reviews.title: Open bottle
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived today upon opening the box I was hit with a strong smell, only to find out that the bottle was half empty and the top was barley screwed on to the bottle, guess the little bit left will have to work...
customer_reviews.author: white buffalo

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I got the package, the product bottle was defective and was leaking everywhere. I tried to replace the item for a new one, but it says this item can’t be replaced. So now I’m stuck with a bottle that’s not even full.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a tiny bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Product was an amazing surprise. I was skeptical of anything working really..but I sprayed my dog from top of neck all along her back down to her tail and that was 4 days ago and I have not seen 1 fly bother her!!!She loves it and I love it. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for dogs
customer_reviews.text: been using this for literally 3 decades to keep flies off my dogs, especially ears. great item
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: We just moved and our poor dog was getting attacked by biting flies and yellow jackets. I spray her with this every morning before she goes out now and no more attacks!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for my pup
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my pup to keep flies off his ears when he's outside. This stuff works great!

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I only get. Maybe two applications per bottle. I had to buy three bottles. Over the summer. Very costly!

customer_reviews.title: Works just as its supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Only had to use this spray once and it worked as described.

customer_reviews.text: A little expensive for such a small bottle But it does work...my dog is happy too...

customer_reviews.title: great Product
customer_reviews.text: Fly's and insects were pain to my dogs until we got Flys-Off my husband is an ambit wood cutter and our Golden Retriever likes to go along. But he lays in the woods and get covered with Insects until we got Flys-off. my husband sprayed him and the insects stay away. Has a funky smell and taste to dogs, mine didn't like that part but; it keeps the insects away.Hurry Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for keeping biting flies off of dogs. I recommend this product to anyone wanting to keep flies or insects off of your dogs.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work...I felt bad for my husbands dog who would cry with flies on her so I bought 3 bottles of this...waste of money...

customer_reviews.title: It's Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a little while. The bottle is too small. The old version in the aerosol can worked much better.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Some of the product spilled in the box. The top wasn’t on all the way. You can send me another one.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job ( should make the bottle a little bigger though)
customer_reviews.text: It works but I don't understand why they don't make the bottle a little bigger. It definitely works to keep flies off of my dogs ears though. Thank you

customer_reviews.text: It's small and you have to put it on just about every day

customer_reviews.title: Best that I have  used.
customer_reviews.text: This worked better then expected. It kept the flies away from my dogs for days. Especially now that it’s hot, I always keep this on hand

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does not work! I bought it because the cream works great. This product you can’t return and it’s worthless. Waste of money! If I could give it a zero star I would.

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the flies off my pup, but she hates the smell of it and runs away. The bottle could be bigger for the price I’m paying.

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This works great but bottle was half way empty and spilled inside the box prior to delivery.

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF WORKS!

customer_reviews.title: As soon as i squirted it on my dog, ...
customer_reviews.text: As soon as i squirted it on my dog, they automatically fly away. if smells very similar to OFF bug spray. The only issue if that the bottle is so incredibly small

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the few products that actually work on Florida mosquitos for dogs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra  Sterns

customer_reviews.title: Great Fly repellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fly repellent. I use to use aerosol but that product has been discontinued. The smell is a little over bearing (too perfumie!) sometimes makes dogs sneeze.
customer_reviews.author: SussieQ

customer_reviews.title: This product works for mosquitos and deer flies
customer_reviews.text: This repellent really works my dog knows what it's for she will come running to me to have it put on but she's not too fond of the sent
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Gehring

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing for my dog!!! His ears were still being ate up by the flies. The bottle was little and not with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Stinks and makes my dogs sneeze, but it works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer ann ready

product_meta.title: Flys-Off Insect Repellent for Dogs & Cats, 6 fl oz
product_meta.description: Flys-Off Mist Insect Repellent in a convenient 6-ounce. pump spray for control of flies, gnats, mosquitoes, fleas, ticks and lice.
feature_bullets: Protects pets from flies, gnats, mosquitoes, fleas, ticks and lice
Also works as a surface repellent on bedding
